titles: The Manner of the King's tryal at Westminster-hall, by the High Court of Justice, from January the 24th to January the 27th, 1648 also the manner of his being put to death at White-hall, near the Banquetting-house, on the 30th day of January, 1648, with his speech made upon the scaffold before he was beheaded : to the tune of Aim not too high, &c.
publisher: Printed by and for C.B. and sold by J. Walter,
notes: Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Charles --  I, --  King of England, 1600-1649 --  Poetry.
